Html: Since Silverlight 4 beta is announced, is there a plan for Prism for SL4?

We plan to start working on the next version of Prism shortly after the first of the year. This version will support .NET 4.0 and SL4. As we get closer, I will make an announcement on my blog: http://blogs.msdn.com/blaine. Additionally, the SE team looked at how the current Prism code works with SL4 beta bits. We will have the SE team blog about their learnings in case people want to start working with SL4 before we do.

p&p Client Team
WPF 4.0 will part of this release as well.
